text: The 1977 GP Ouest-France was the 41st edition of the GP Ouest-France cycle race and was held on 23 August 1977. The race started and finished in Plouay. The race was won by Jacques Bossis. ==General classification== {| |Final general classification {| class="wikitable" |- ! scope="col" | Rank ! scope="col" | Rider ! scope="col" | Time |- | style="text-align:center;" | 1 | | style="text-align:right;" | |- | style="text-align:center;" | 2 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 0" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 3 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 0" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 4 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 0" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 5 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 15" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 6 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 2' 10" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 7 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 2' 10" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 8 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 2' 10" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 9 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 2' 10" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 10 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 2' 15" |} |} ==References== 1977 Category:1977 in road cycling Category:1977 in French sport
